system.description: When you act to establish control over a new area, group, or resource, roll +Grasp.

failure.label: Miss (6-)
failure.value: You fail to establish control, and your attempt creates new problems or opposition.

partial.label: Weak Hit (7-9)
partial.value: You establish control, but choose one: it's temporary and will need to be reinforced, it comes with unexpected obligations, or it creates a rival.

success.label: Strong Hit (10+)
success.value: You establish solid control. Gain +1 Reach and describe what you now control.
